sentences.en: "And we had a surprising result from an experiment with one seal following another," he said.
sentences.cn: “并且，我们在一项实验中惊奇地发现，一直海豹紧跟着另一只。”他说。

sentences.en: an airtight seal around the windows
sentences.cn: 窗户四周的密封条

sentences.en: An unused wing of the hospital was sealed off.
sentences.cn: 一个未启用的医院侧厅被封锁了

sentences.en: Check seals on fridges and freezers regularly.
sentences.cn: 定期检查冰箱和冰柜的密封装置。

sentences.en: Crimp the edges to seal them tightly.
sentences.cn: 把边缘折起来以便封紧。

sentences.en: Do you think I ought to seal the boxes up?
sentences.cn: 你认为我应该把这些盒子封起来吗?

sentences.en: Dried milk is kept in hermetically sealed (= very tightly closed ) containers.
sentences.cn: 奶粉储藏在完全密封的容器里。

sentences.en: He broke the wax seal and unrolled the paper.
sentences.cn: 他揭去封蜡，把纸卷展开。

sentences.en: He sealed the envelope and put on a stamp.
sentences.cn: 他封好信封，贴了张邮票。

sentences.en: I've bought a seal to put around the edge of the bath.
sentences.cn: 我买了一种密封胶涂在浴缸边缘上.

sentences.en: it was the Stewart dynasty which most markedly set its seal on the place.
sentences.cn: 正是斯图亚特王朝在这个地方标上了它显明的印记。

sentences.en: Ministers have put their seal of approval on the proposal.
sentences.cn: 部长们已经批准了该提案。

sentences.en: Not long after setting off, Eliyah spots a grey seal resting on some thick ice. He stops the boat and Tommy jumps out.
sentences.cn: 出发后不久，艾里亚就看见一头灰色的海豹在一块厚冰上休憩，他停下船来，汤米跃身跳出船去。

sentences.en: Seal tightly then leave for four to five days to macerate.
sentences.cn: 密封之后再浸泡4至5天。

sentences.en: Smith’s goal sealed the victory.
sentences.cn: 史密斯的入球锁定了胜局。

sentences.en: Soldiers there are going to seal the airport off.
sentences.cn: 那里的士兵将封锁机场。

sentences.en: the annual seal cull
sentences.cn: 每年对海豹的选择性宰杀

sentences.en: The best wines are entitled to a numbered seal of quality.
sentences.cn: 上等葡萄酒可以盖上带编号的优质产品印章。

sentences.en: The coffee is freeze-dried to seal in all the flavour.
sentences.cn: 咖啡经冷冻干燥以保留原汁原味。

sentences.en: The document carried the seal of the governor’s office.
sentences.cn: 文件上盖有州长办公室的章。

sentences.en: The Redskins punted. Dallas then marched 79 yards to seal the victory.
sentences.cn: 红人队选择了弃踢，达拉斯队随即跑出79码从而锁定胜局。

sentences.en: The seal on the box broke when it fell from its hiding-place.
sentences.cn: 盒子从隐藏处掉落时，封口裂开了。

sentences.en: The seal's flipper is homologous with the human arm.
sentences.cn: 海豹的鳍肢与人类的手臂同源。

sentences.en: the sleek dark head of a seal
sentences.cn: 黑乎乎、油光光的海豹脑袋

sentences.en: the UN envoy hopes to set the seal on a lasting peace.
sentences.cn: 联合国特使希望持久和平能确定下来。

sentences.en: The window was sealed shut.
sentences.cn: 这扇窗户被封了起来。

sentences.en: They darted spears at the seal.
sentences.cn: 他们把标矛掷向海豹。

sentences.en: Two thousand grey seal pups are born there every autumn.
sentences.cn: 那里每年秋天有2,000头灰色小海豹出生。

sentences.en: When assembling the pie, wet the edges where the two crusts join, to form a seal.
sentences.cn: 捏合馅饼时，弄湿两块面皮封合的边缘，以形成一个封口。

sentences.en: Write your letter and seal it in a blank envelope.
sentences.cn: 信写好后把它装进空白信封里封好。

words.tran_cn: 盖印人；检验员；密封层；捕海豹的船或猎人
封闭，[机] 密封；补铸件的漏洞；猎捕海豹业
[机]密封；印章；[皮革][脊椎]海豹；封条；标志

phrases.tran_cn: 迷宫式密封；曲径密封垫片

phrases.phrase: my (或 his 等) lips are sealed

phrases.tran_cn: n. 橡胶密封圈；橡皮垫；橡胶塞；橡皮密封
封锁：用路障或封锁线使关得严实或包围
注定命运（常指产生不幸或不愉快的结局）

phrases.phrase: set (或 put) one's seal to (或 on)
phrases.tran_cn: 给…盖印；打上显明的烙印
轴封，轴封装置；主轴密封

trans.tran_cn: 印章，保证，密封处/物/垫，封条/蜡，海豹
trans.tran_en: a large sea animal that eats fish and lives around coasts
a large sea animal that eats fish and lives around coasts

trans.tran_cn: 封上，密封，覆盖表面，确定，关闭
trans.tran_en: to cover the surface of something with something that will protect it
When you seal an envelope, you close it by folding part of it over and sticking it down, so that it cannot be opened without being torn
